channel.title: BM Map Packs - Cross Compatibility ?
channel.description:
well, i figured i'd install all the community made Single Player maps for BM:
Surface Tension Uncut [url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-surface-tension-uncut[/url]
On A Rail Uncut [url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-on-a-rail-uncut[/url]
"We've Got Hostiles!" - Vent Mod [url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-weve-got-hostiles-vent-mod[/url]
UPLINK [url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-uplink[/url]
XEN (improved maps from HL, NOT THE REAL THING THAT THE BM TEAM IS WORKING ON!) [url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-xen-improved-maps-from-half-life[/url]
On A Rail - Loop Mod [url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-on-a-rail-loop-mod[/url]
I know i'll have to rebuild the scenes.image and recompile the english subtitles, but will they work as they should if they are all installed ?
Thanks :smiley:

item.title: BM Map Packs - Cross Compatibility ?
item.dc:creator: Alex_Wolfenstein97
item.description:
well, i figured i’d install all the community made Single Player maps for BM:

Surface Tension Uncut
https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-surface-tension-uncut

On A Rail Uncut
https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-on-a-rail-uncut

“We’ve Got Hostiles!” - Vent Mod
https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-weve-got-hostiles-vent-mod

UPLINK
https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-uplink

XEN (improved maps from HL, NOT THE REAL THING THAT THE BM TEAM IS WORKING ON!)
https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-xen-improved-maps-from-half-life

On A Rail - Loop Mod
https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-on-a-rail-loop-mod

I know i’ll have to rebuild the scenes.image and recompile the english subtitles, but will they work as they should if they are all installed ?

Thanks
